byline.original: By HELENE COOPER, ERIC SCHMITT and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT

abstract: United States special forces capture significant Islamic State operative, whom they decline to identify, in Iraq; US forces are expected to apprehend number of others soon, raising questions about how detainees will be handled.
snippet: American defense officials described the capture as a crucial development in battling the Islamic State but said it also raised questions about handling what is likely to be a growing group of detainees....

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: American defense officials described the capture as a crucial development in battling the Islamic State but said it also raised questions about handling what is likely to be a growing group of detainees.

headline.main: U.S. Captures ISIS Operative, Ushering in Tricky Phase
headline.print_headline: U.S. Captures ISIS Operative, Ushering In Tricky Phase
